1.title: Who the F#@% is Strangling Jack
1.plot: Strangling Jack tells you why you should care who this person is. Jack goes over his comedy and performance history so you have a frame of reference for the series. He also goes into detail about his first 3 stand up comedy shows at open mics in Las Vegas. He finishes up with some quick tips from pros for anyone thinking of getting into the crazy business of stand up comedy.

2.title: Taking the Bullet
2.plot: Jack takes the bullet, tells you how he writes a joke, and finds his comedy home. Working stand up comedians tell you their process and Jack meets four new comedy allies.

3.title: Bombing
3.plot: Jack deals with a whole week of bombing as he works on a new set. Working comics talk about their experiences bombing and give advice on how to deal with it. Jack reminisces on a bombing experience that changed his comedy career.

4.title: Using Your Talents
4.plot: Jack reveals a new talent at his first booked show and talks about an audience he's always had trouble with. Working comics discuss their style of comedy and express the importance of using your talents.

5.title: The Rules of Comedy
5.plot: Jack reenacts a Saturday Night Live sketch on an unsuspecting audience and debuts a new set. Working comics talk about the rules of comedy and Toxic Flow sings about his hoes.

imdb.plot outline: The first night is a bomb. He forgets the material, gets heckled, veritably dies on stage. But Jack does a show the very next night. And the next night. And the next night. People actually laugh. And the game is on. This is a show about the ups and downs of the comedy world from the perspective of an up and coming comic on a mission to complete 100 nights of stand up comedy. The show follows the full roller coaster: the bombs, the kills, the anguish, the high. It's all in there. Jack goes through each of the shows in as much detail as is necessary. The progression is broken up by episode-themed topics like "The Process" or "The Callback" ...or "the Rule of Three." Jack teaches you what he knows about comedy and talks to working comics to get their take on the subject of the day. He shares the lessons he learns on the road by reading the crowd and watching and talking to other comics, and interviewing venue owners to get their take on this strange business. And finally, you get to see the life a comedian lives - Being broke, struggling, and chasing the dream.
imdb.title: 100 Nights with Strangling Jack
plot: 100 NIGHTS with Strangling Jack" is a documentary series following comedic actor Strangling Jack's first 100 shows of his journey to becoming a working stand up comedian.::Chris Weidman

The progression is broken up by episode-themed topics like "The Process" or "The Callback" ...or "the Rule of Three." Jack teaches you what he knows about comedy and talks to working comics to get their take on the subject of the day. He shares the lessons he learns on the road by reading the crowd and watching and talking to other comics, and interviewing venue owners to get their take on this strange business. And finally, you get to see the life a comedian lives - Being broke, struggling, and chasing the dream.::Chris Weidman
